rows.label: tlk400704_msg0001
rows.name:
Looks like you completed the mission.
Good work, Rex.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0003
rows.name:
As you complete missions, it'll build
our band's reputation. The higher our
reputation, the more missions we'll get!

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0004
rows.name:
And it'll also let you manage more
Blades at a time.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0005
rows.name: Sounds like a good thing all round.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0006
rows.name:
This time you set up a mission for me,
but how should I find more in future?

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, let's see now. We'll send a few
missions your way ourselves.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0008
rows.name:
Aside from that, you can ask around
town, see if anyone needs help.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0023
rows.name:
There are plenty of people out there
with troubles that need solving.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0009
rows.name:
Might be a good idea for you to go
back and see how things are in
Avaritia or Gula, too.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0010
rows.name: Ah, right. I'll have to remember that.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0011
rows.name:
Oh yeah, I have one more piece
of advice for you.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0012
rows.name:
Different missions have different
requirements, and each Blade has
strengths and weaknesses too.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0024
rows.name:
If you pay attention to the makeup
of your squad, you might be able to
get the job done quicker.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0013
rows.name:
Think about everyone's strengths
and weaknesses to get missions
done efficiently...got it.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0014
rows.name: Sounds like you're getting the idea.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0015
rows.name:
For now, just try to complete as many
missions as you can. Once you're used
to that, we'll see what else you can do.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0016
rows.name:
I'll be wanting to give you a test,
so drop by Hr√¶svelgr once in a while!

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0017
rows.name:
I have to take tests, even though
I'm the leader...?

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0018
rows.name:
Oh, and remember - whenever you
have Blades going spare, don't hesitate
to assign them to a bunch of missions.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0019
rows.name:
We aren't going to run out of missions
any time soon. The world is full of folk
who need a little mercenary help.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0020
rows.name:
Helping people in need... So this is
what Vandham devoted his life to.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0021
rows.name:
I'll have to work hard to make this
a mercenary band he'd be proud of.

rows.label: tlk400704_msg0022
rows.name:
That's the spirit, Rex. We're all
counting on you, so keep it up!
